kannada_original: ಅಹಿತ ನೆನೆಯುವ ಮನಸು ತಾನೆ ಕೆಡುವುದು ಮೊದಲು
english_transliteration: Ahita neneyuva manasu tāne keḍuvudu modalu
english_translation: The mind that remembers unpleasant things spoils itself first,
like riding a mad horse and falling to the ground.

kannada_original: ತನ್ನ ಮನೆ ಪರರ ಮನೆ ಎಲ್ಲ ಕಿಚ್ಚಿಗೆ ಒಂದೆ;
english_transliteration: Tanna mane parara mane ella kiccige onde;
english_translation: His own house or others' houses, fire is the same for all;
Do not set fire to the house (mind) – Muddu Rāma.
